subject: Bug Fixes
message: Fixed vote lockout.  Fixed min votes start at 1.  Removed duplicate categories.

subject: Clear vendor list
message: Added a menu item to forcibly clear the vendor list.  Requires user to have the EDIT STAFF and EDIT VENDOR roles.

subject: Working on image loader
message: Started working on the image loader, lots of issues with it, but not going to give up.  Will probably add a method of stripping out URLs from the photo data and present them as a clickable link.

subject: Changelog display
message: Display change log on dashboard index page.
